about_the_game:
Diorama Tower Defense: Tiny Kingdom (Prologue) is a cute tower defense game with currently three different dioramas (tiny rooms), as well as three difficulty levels.

Your task is to stop the enchanted fantasy creatures like elves, goblins, trolls, rainbow unicorns and so on from reaching the king of the little kingdom, King Arthur, because he is allergic to those cute creatures. Because the evil witch Samira has turned the creatures into sugar-sweet beings. Now strategically build towers on the playing fields to fend off the hordes.

You have the following towers at your disposal for defense: Archer Tower, Cannon Tower, Fire Tower, Ice Tower, Ballista and Poison Tower. You can also upgrade them further. By neutralizing enemies you can earn money to buy more towers or upgrade them as you wish. You also have the power to manipulate time, so you can rewind time but also make it move faster, thanks to Merlin.

Join our Discord server and follow the further development of Diorama TD. Have a lot of fun!!!

Diorama Tower Defense: Tiny Kingdom (Prologue) is a cute tower defense game with currently three different dioramas (tiny rooms), as well as three difficulty levels.

Your task is to stop the enchanted fantasy creatures like elves, goblins, trolls, rainbow unicorns and so on from reaching the king of the little kingdom, King Arthur, because he is allergic to those cute creatures. Because the evil witch Samira has turned the creatures into sugar-sweet beings. Now strategically build towers on the playing fields to fend off the hordes.

You have the following towers at your disposal for defense: Archer Tower, Cannon Tower, Fire Tower, Ice Tower, Ballista and Poison Tower. You can also upgrade them further. By neutralizing enemies you can earn money to buy more towers or upgrade them as you wish. You also have the power to manipulate time, so you can rewind time but also make it move faster, thanks to Merlin.

Join our Discord server and follow the further development of Diorama TD. Have a lot of fun!!!
name: Diorama Tower Defense: Tiny Kingdom (Prologue)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: Diorama Tower Defense: Tiny Kingdom (Prologue) is a cute tower defense game with currently three different dioramas, as well as three difficulty levels. The objective is to stop the enchanted creatures from reaching the king of Tiny Kingdom, since he is allergic to those creatures.
